Name: Anastasia Beverly Hills
Natural: Anastasia Beverly Hills Liquid Lipstick delivers long-lasting, smudge-proof matte color with a full-pigment formula and precise applicator. Comfortable and customizable, it's perfect for all-day wear and even doubles as blush.

Name: Charlotte Tilbury
Natural: Charlotte Tilbury's Pillow Talk collection offers universally flattering nude-pink lipsticks, eyeshadows, and blushes for day-to-disco looks. With iconic shades and push-up effect mascara, it's designed for dreamy beauty in every skin tone.

Name: Too Faced
Natural: Too Faced Melted Matte Lipstick features 8-hour wear, a plumping no-sting formula with avocado oil and hyaluronic spheres, and a smooth, weightless feel. The angled applicator ensures bold, ultra-matte color without dryness.

Name: NARS
Natural: NARS Audacious Lipstick provides single-stroke, satin-finish coverage in bold, long-lasting shades. Its creamy texture hydrates while preventing feathering—ideal for statement lips with luxurious feel and intense pigment.

Name: Revlon
Natural: Revlon ColorStay Matte Lite Crayon is a smudge-proof, water-resistant matte lipstick that's 30% lighter than average. Infused with mango seed oil and packed in a precise crayon with built-in sharpener, it's made for bold, comfortable wear.

Name: L'Oréal Paris
Natural: L'Oréal Paris Colour Riche Intense Volume Matte Lipstick offers 16-hour bold color with hyaluronic acid for fuller, hydrated lips. Its slim bullet and non-drying finish ensure precise, all-day comfort and plumping effect.

Name: MAC
Natural: MAC Love Me Lipstick infuses argan oil for all-day moisture with a weightless, satin finish. With vibrant reds, flattering neutrals, and expressive bolds, it's made to empower self-expression in every swipe.

Name: Maybelline
Natural: Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink lasts up to 16 hours with a no-transfer formula and arrow applicator. Available in 36 shades, it offers intense matte color and a flawless finish for all-day confidence.
